name: Ruomu Shao
title: Network & Full-Stack Engineer
summary: Mid-level Network & Full-Stack Engineer (3+ years) with solid telecom background and hands-on AWS cloud experience. Proven in delivering customer-facing AI voice workflows, PBX/VoIP solutions and JavaScript extensions. Skilled across routing, AWS serverless, React/Next.js and database integrations. Seeking network/telecom/software hybrid roles where I can bridge infrastructure and code to drive service reliability.

education.institution: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT)

experience.title: Network Engineer
experience.description: Managing L3+ infrastructure and developing AI-powered solutions for ISP operations
achievements: Manage L3+ infrastructure including BGP routing, VoIP/PBX systems, and complex network troubleshooting across ISP operations
Developed AI-powered email assistance system using OpenAI API fine-tuning with RAG integration, reducing support response time by 70%
Built automated order management microservices for subscription pull/cancellation workflows, eliminating manual processing delays
Integrated AWS Connect with on-premise PBX systems, improving customer call routing and reducing transfer times by 35%

experience.title: Intern Engineer
achievements: Optimized PLC logic on filling line, boosting throughput by 8%

projects.name: AWS-based AI Voice Workflow for Broadband Support
projects.description: Built serverless workflow enabling customers to self-check fibre status via phone using AI voice interaction
highlights: Integrated Telnet CRM and Chorus Line Test API to provide real-time fibre status information
Achieved 40% IVR self-resolution rate in first month of deployment
Implemented CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions and Infrastructure as Code via AWS SAM

projects.name: GPT-Powered Email Reply Chrome Extension
projects.description: Developed JavaScript extension that calls fine-tuned GPT model to draft email replies based on previous email threads
highlights: Reduced average support reply drafting time from 5 minutes to 1 minute
Deployed to over 15 support agents at Telnet Telecommunication

projects.name: AI Prompt Sharing Website
projects.description: Full-stack web application for sharing and discovering AI prompts with social features
highlights: Implemented user authentication via Google OAuth
Deployed on Vercel with full responsive design

interests: Network automation and infrastructure as code

additional_info.career_goals: Seeking network/telecom/software hybrid roles where I can bridge infrastructure and code to drive service reliability. Particularly interested in positions that combine networking expertise with cloud architecture and software development.
additional_info.work_authorization: New Zealand Residence Visa (no work restrictions)
additional_info.availability: Currently employed, available for new opportunities with appropriate notice period
additional_info.personality: Self-driven engineer who proactively identifies problems and builds solutions. Combines deep technical networking knowledge with full-stack development skills. Strong communicator capable of translating complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Thrives in fast-paced environments requiring both independent problem-solving and team collaboration.
fun_facts: Hold an Australian Driver's License and enjoy road trips exploring New Zealand
Built multiple AI-powered tools that are actively used in production by my current team
Achieved CCNP Enterprise certification in 2025, demonstrating commitment to networking excellence
